scripts.dev: pnpm -s run dev:air || pnpm -s run dev:reflex || pnpm -s run dev:go
scripts.build: pnpm -s run build:clean && go build -o dist/bridge ./cmd/bridge
scripts.build:prod: pnpm -s run build:clean && go build -ldflags='-s -w' -o dist/bridge ./cmd/bridge
scripts.lint: golangci-lint run || echo "golangci-lint not installed; skipping"
